song.englishname: All The Way My Savior Leads Me

english.segment1: All the way my Savior leads me. Who have I to ask beside. How could I doubt His tender mercy. Who through life has been my guide
english.segment2: All the way my Savior leads me. Cheers each winding path I tread. Gives me grace for every trial. Feeds me with the living Bread
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. You lead me and keep me from falling. You carry me close to Your heart. And surely Your goodness and mercy will follow me
english.segment4: All the way my Savior leads me. O, the fullness of His love. O, the sureness of His promise. In the triumph of His blood. And when my spirit clothed immortal. Wings its flight to realms of day. This my song through endless ages. Jesus led me all the way. Jesus led me all the way
english.segment5: All the way my Savior leads me. All the way my Savior leads me
